title: Computer Science Engineering
description: Focuses on programming, algorithms, software development, and AI. High demand in India and abroad.

title: Medicine (MBBS)
description: The path to becoming a doctor. Involves diagnosing, treating, and preventing illnesses.

title: Law
description: Study of legal systems, constitution, and justice. Great for those with good logic and communication skills.

title: Design (Fashion/Product/Graphic)
description: Creative field focusing on aesthetics, functionality, and innovation.

title: Business Management (BBA/BMS)
description: Focuses on business operations, marketing, finance, and HR.
